comments: DeRozan (CHI) maintains a legal guarding position and absorbs the body contact that occurs during Bey's (DET) driving shot attempt.
Vucevic (CHI) establishes himself in a screening position in Jackson's (DET) path and gives one step of distance before absorbing the contact, some of which occurs to Jackson's foot.
Joseph (DET) makes clean contact with the ball and dislodges it away from Ball (CHI) during his upward shooting motion.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Ball (CHI) touches the ball last before it goes out of bounds.
Grant (DET) brings his off-arm toward Caruso's (CHI) front and marginal contact occurs as Grant releases away at the top of the perimeter.
Grant (DET) and Caruso (CHI) make incidental foot-to-foot contact with one another at the end of the drive.
Vucevic (CHI) and Bey (DET) engage and disengage with one another as they move toward the lane.
Bey (DET) and Vucevic (CHI) engage and disengage with one another during rebounding.
Stewart (DET) firms up in his screening position in Ball's (CHI) path and absorbs the contact.

Ball (CHI) does not get up to ball height and initiates contact with Grant's (DET) right forearm that affects his jump shot attempt. On his follow through Grant turns and extends his right leg, which connects with Ball. The contact is marginal.
Bey (DET) swipes down and initiates contact with DeRozan's (CHI) head.
Jackson (DET) rests his hands on Caruso's (CHI) hips and marginal contact occurs as Caruso moves toward the perimeter.
Grant (DET) is late to the spot and does not establish a legal guarding position prior to the contact with LaVine (CHI) taking place.
Correctly called delay of game warning against DET.
Williams (CHI) swipes down and makes clean contact with the ball during Grant's (DET) upward shooting motion.
Ball (CHI) and Joseph (DET) engage and disengage with one another during rebounding.
Grant (DET) commits a take foul on LaVine (CHI).
Joseph (DET) brings his off-arm toward Ball's (CHI) side as he spins toward the baseline and marginal contact occurs.
Olynyk (DET) establishes himself in a screening position in DeRozan's (CHI) path and absorbs the contact.
Jackson (DET) initiates contact across LaVine's (CHI) left arm after he secures the rebound.
Olynyk (DET) brings his hands toward Vucevic's (CHI) front and marginal contact occurs as Vucevic is passing.
Vucevic (CHI) legally contests Grant's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Ball (CHI) makes incidental arm contact with Joseph (DET) during rebounding.
